ygData.subject: Re: The order
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron looked at the helpless prisoner. This wont be as much fun as I hoped, Megatron thought to himself. Their better when they are full of spirit, ah well.

Megatron looked at the helpless prisoner. This wont be as much fun as I
hoped, Megatron thought to himself. Their better when they are full of
spirit, ah well. "Wildrider, release the Beastbox cassette". Wildrider
let go of what he had in his hand. It transformed into his ape mode,
rubbing his head. He then sniffed the air, and grunted. "I'm tired of
being kicked around all the time." he said, looking at Perceptor. "NOW I
DO THE KICKING" He yelled as he launched himself towards Perceptor,
begining to rain down fists at the robot. "What is your alligience?"
Megatron asked, with a hint of enjoyement in his voice.
